abstract: AT&T is taking the next step in its marketing makeover with an extensive brand advertising campaign, scheduled to begin today, that is focused on mobile lifestyles.
snippet: AT&T is taking the next step in its marketing makeover with an extensive brand advertising campaign, scheduled to begin today, that is focused on mobile lifestyles.
lead_paragraph: AT&T is taking the next step in its marketing makeover with an extensive brand advertising campaign, scheduled to begin today, that is focused on mobile life styles.

headline.main: AT&T Aims to Put Its Mark on Mobility
headline.print_headline: AT&T Aims to Put Its Mark on Mobility
